node.title: Greg Hunt says Omicron appears to be 'manageable', border pause only temporary
node.alt: Karen andrews wearing a yellow blazer
node.description: Federal Health Minister Greg Hunt says the government's "overwhelming view" is that the Omicron variant is "manageable" and that advice is that it may be milder than other variants.
node.content:
["Federal Health Minister Greg Hunt says the government's \"overwhelming view\" is that the Omicron variant is \"manageable\" and that advice is that it may be milder than other variants.", "Mr Hunt said the government's decision to pause planned easing of border restrictions\u00a0for international students and other eligible visa holders was done out of an \"abundance of caution\".", "Wednesday's planned\u00a0partial border reopening has been pushed back until December 15.", "\"All of this is done on the presumption that we will recommence from 15 December, but medical advice will guide our decision-making throughout,\" Mr Hunt\u00a0said.", "\"We're doing this out of an abundance of caution but our overwhelming view is that while\u00a0it's an emerging variant, it's a manageable variant.\"", "Home Affairs Minister Karen Andrews said the government did not take the decision lightly.", "\"We have\u00a0been very focused on doing all we can to open our international borders as safely and quickly as we possibly can do,\" Ms Andrews\u00a0said.", "As for changes to quarantine and a return of 14-day hotel quarantine, Ms Andrews said it would be a matter for states and territories.", "Chief Medical Officer Paul Kelly said the five people who had tested positive to the\u00a0Omicron variant in Australia were experiencing \"mild or, in fact, no disease\".", "However, he said, there were still many unknowns about the variant.", "\"We don't know still about the vaccine effectiveness,\" he said.\u00a0\"We don't know about severity and there's mixed reports on that from South Africa itself.\"", "Professor Kelly said the Australian Technical Advisory Group on Immunisation (ATAGI) had met with the Department of Health to look at what international information there was on vaccine effectiveness and the variant.", "The Chief Medical Officer met with ATAGI this morning to discuss whether the interval in booster shots should be reduced from the current advice of six months after a second dose.", "Prime Minister Scott Morrison and state and territory leaders are expected to discuss the response to the Omicron variant at National Cabinet this afternoon.", "", "
Heavily mutated Omicron variant puts scientist on alert
"]
